entry.title: Revelations
entry.summary:
Author: invisiblestrings18

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,490Chapters: 4/8Kudos: 6

Summary: Eddie Diaz is going back to El Paso with Christopher tonight. It has been weeks since Bobby's funeral. He and Buck are still in a delicate spot after their fight, and both of them are struggling to express their emotions about everything surrounding the funeral and El Paso. They soon go to Eddie's going away party, which stirs up some of his repressed emotions around El Paso, Buck, and his childhood.

entry.title: Hunger for you
entry.summary:
Author: LunaDusktreader

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 94Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck has always known that the chemistry between him and Eddie was undeniable, but he never imagined that a simple moment of care could ignite such intense and forbidden desire. When Eddie begins to deal with the unexpected effects of lactation, the discomfort quickly turns into something new ‚Äì a need that awakens unfamiliar sensations.At first, it is just an innocent touch, a gesture of support. But when Buck notices the way Eddie reacts, their gazes linger, their touches become more lingering, and the tension between them becomes impossible to ignore. Between hesitant whispers and bodies seeking each other, they discover a shared pleasure that scares and excites them in equal measure.What began as a moment of vulnerability turns into an explosion of desire and connection. But are they ready to accept what this means for the relationship they have built? Between surrender and uncertainty, Buck and Eddie will discover that, sometimes, hunger goes far beyond what can be controlled.

entry.title: The New Recruit
entry.summary:
Author: Ellesworth86

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,754Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 182

Summary: A S2 AU fic.Eddie Diaz is a mystery. He's been at the 118 for three months now and Chimney knows four things about him - he's gay, he's married to a man called Buck, he has a son and he transferred from El Paso.Ethan Stark is a new recruit. 6'2" tall, around the same age as Eddie, with lighter hair and a birthmark decorating his left eye. He's been fast-tracked through the academy to work at the new 142 firehouse and seems to be an open book, but slowly Chimney starts to notice that maybe he's not quite all he seems...ORThe Buck undercover fic.

entry.title: i have more than enough
entry.summary:
Author: starsandthesea

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,146Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 54

Summary: Hen tilted her head and squinted at Buck, ‚ÄúAre you happy?‚ÄùHad he heard that right?‚ÄúAm I happy?‚Äù‚ÄúYes. Answer me, I know you‚Äôre doing better, but are you happy?‚Äù‚ÄúUh‚Ä¶ Yeah‚Ä¶ Why?‚ÄùOf course he was happy. He was 6 months into his marriage with the love of his life. Along with Christopher, they had already been functioning as a family unit for pretty much the past 10 years, but now it was official which made it all the sweeter. How could he not be happy?Or the one in which Buck gets injured on a call and has to take leave to heal. During his leave, Hen and Karen conspire to test a theory they've had for quite some time (they're right).This is going to be long and lots of hurt/comfort because I like reading that so I'm writing it. Also I'm allergic to being concise...

entry.title: The Bolter
entry.summary:
Author: Jack3402

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,710Chapters: 14/15Kudos: 720

Summary: From a very young age, Evan Buckley knew he would end up alone.After Eddie leaves to go after Chris, Buck knows that he needs to get out of Los Angeles for a while. He travels just like he did before he joined the 118, looking for a reason to keep going after losing the family he thought would finally stay.Eddie moves to Texas and slowly but surely gains the trust of his son back. After 4 long months of long conversations and hard realizations, Christopher finally wants to move back to Los Angeles.But what happens when they return and Buck is nowhere to be found, and nobody but Maddie is able to get in contact with him? What happens when Eddie finds out just how badly he hurt the love of his life, and now he can't tell him just how much he truly needs him to be okay?

entry.title: Keep Me (In the Pocket of your Jeans)
entry.summary:
Author: Pxrpls

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,900Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 314

Summary: That‚Äôs his problem. Buck always manages to make the calls personal, even if they are so far behind his realm of reality. He always makes them about himself, he had been told this way too many times already. And he‚Äôs trying to change, he really is. But then there are moments like these in which a little girl needs saving and Buck blurs the line between what‚Äôs his job and his own need to be there for everyone he meets. His need to fix everything. ¬† So he stays there, just for that first surgery he keeps reminding himself, just to make sure she makes it out of the ER. Just to make sure Hen is right and she is in good hands. And a few hours later, when she makes it out and the doctor‚Äôs look around the waiting room for Cassie‚Äôs parents without all the context Buck already has, he stands up. On instinct. Barely even a lie. He couldn‚Äôt count it as one when he hadn‚Äôt spoken at all. He just stands up. He stands up and he follows the doctor to the ICU. In which Buck worries about the little girl he just saved from a fire, and he gives her a home in his arms.

entry.title: The Fire That Took Me With It
entry.summary:
Author: 07goldy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,439Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 108

Summary: After a devastating apartment fire leaves Buck with third-degree burns across his arms and back, he survives ‚Äî but something inside him doesn‚Äôt. The station celebrates his survival, calls him a hero, but all Buck can feel is the ghost of the man he used to be. Recovery is slow, and the mirror is merciless. He can‚Äôt work, can‚Äôt hold Maddie‚Äôs baby without shaking, and worse ‚Äî Eddie stops looking at him the same way.He was always the one who ran into flames without hesitation. Now, even the kitchen stove makes his heart race.And when the nightmares come ‚Äî of smoke, screams, and the feeling of being left behind ‚Äî he starts to wonder if maybe the fire didn‚Äôt fail to kill him‚Ä¶ it just left him behind to burn in silence.

entry.title: The Muse I Ain't Refusin'
entry.summary:
Author: polyphemus_curtains

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,508Chapters: 5/8Kudos: 27

Summary: the one where Buck worked as a swamp guide in Louisiana before he traveled to PeruBefore Peru and after the SEALS, there was a point in Buck‚Äôs life where he didn‚Äôt have much direction. Not that that specific point in his life had direction at all but still. Buck was at the ranch for a month when he met an older man from Louisiana named Leo. He had an accent that no one could really understand and a few missing fingers. He told stories of his time as a swamp guide outside of New Orleans, including harrowing tales of wrestling alligators and fishing for killer catfish. These tales, of course, caught Buck‚Äôs attention.After a few weeks of working with him, Buck decided a change in scenery might be necessary. Plus, gumbo didn‚Äôt sound all that bad.Starting somewhere around the end of season 4
